data.name: Superhero Recruitment Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Miss being in the office? Want a career in recruitment? Obsessed with superhero's?

Superhero Recruitment Simulator is an opportunity for you to work within the industry as a recruiter! Match candidates to job descriptions! Make sure you send the correct candidates out and the correct amount!

How to do well at work:

• Match candidates to job descriptions,
• Read over 100 superhero applications,
• Get through the day despite open windows making your papers go everywhere,
• Make sure colleagues don’t knock your desk,
• Ignore your boss if they mess up your papers,
• Don’t make your boss mad by incorrectly matching applications to job descriptions,
• Don’t make your boss mad by sending out too many applications,
• Don’t make your boss mad by sending out too little applications,
• Don’t make your boss mad!

Made with the Godot Engine.

Now get to work!

data.short_description: Miss being in the office? Want a career in recruitment? Obsessed with superhero's? Superhero Recruitment Simulator is your opportunity for you to work within the industry as a recruiter!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Please note that all superheros, passport details, phone numbers, addresses and other details are purely fictitious.
